goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.4: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
